communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am submitting a Colorado Open Records Act (CORA) request seeking access to specific documents related to your department's activities for the 180 day period preceding today, from Friday, February 9, 2024, to Wednesday, August 7, 2024. Specifically, I am requesting:

1. All records of CORA requests sent to your department during the specified 180 day period.
2. All records of CORA responses issued by your department in response to external requests within the same timeframe.
3. A copy of the fee schedule for processing CORA requests and any associated costs.
4. A copy of your department's open records policy for reference.
5.Correspondence in relationship to CORA requests sent between government entities.

Please include details such as dates, requestors' names, and request contents in the CORA records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samuel Newton

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Samuel Newton, 

Thank you for registering with the Greenwood Village Public Records Center. 
Your Login ID is:  171299-85757811@requests.muckrock.com 
If you did not submit your request through the website portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may Request a Temporary Password. (https://greenwoodvillageco.mycusthelp.com/WEBAPP/_rs/forgotpassword.aspx) 
Please login to "My Request Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. 
Thank You, 
City of Greenwood Village 
This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account.  Please DO NOT REPLY.

communications.subject: Police Records Request :: P001589-080724
communications.communication:
Thank you for your police records / media request of the City of Greenwood Village Police Department. Your request has been received and is being processed in accordance with the Colorado Open Records Act, and in accordance with the Greenwood Village Police Department’s Records Policy.  Your request was received in this office on 8/7/2024 and is assigned reference number P001589-080724 for tracking purposes. 

Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am submitting a Colorado Open Records Act (CORA) request seeking access to specific documents related to your department's activities for the 180 day period preceding today, from Friday, February 9, 2024, to Wednesday, August 7, 2024. Specifically, I am requesting:

1. All records of CORA requests sent to your department during the specified 180 day period.
2. All records of CORA responses issued by your department in response to external requests within the same timeframe.
3. A copy of the fee schedule for processing CORA requests and any associated costs.
4. A copy of your department's open records policy for reference.
5.Correspondence in relationship to CORA requests sent between government entities.

Please include details such as dates, requestors' names, and request contents in the CORA records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Samuel Newton

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fgreenwood-village-police-department-25683%252Fcora-logs-171299%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AAH9htMNuNYjflfMTeSEifzRYV0%3A1sbupn%3AKAoc3LTsRN4XKV9XaYwxQ_o23l53iPvtDuEM5WVWiUk 

Your request will be forwarded to various department personnel to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. Occasionally, a police record request will involve the need to perform extensive research.  There could be a charge, on an hourly basis, for research of information.  You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records requested. 

PLEASE NOTE: The Colorado Open Records Act does not require the creation of new information, to do legal research, or to answer questions. You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you will receive an email when your request has been completed. Again, thank you for using the Greenwood Village Police Records Center. 

To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the Greenwood Village Police Records Center. (https://u8387795.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.PYICgxP3kfgZjR-2B4e9nPlK-2BSCtfnk7KrAjqVE-2B-2BlVw0uSNL3PN2I6xqWTzro-2BeTzMd6095q-2F-2BGKrhYd8oM71Ayaa7RjAn9NYo6xFiyvA1u0-3DM9bY_6cQGXo3KHJeo2UPC-2BtljfeX7evVGxvKkxyuGuTQUY9sdzOSxX3BnDHUZDWwsBAxBUXgVaa7gaQE3kfBZIv7GDK3VmvwnuhpxTE-2F86wkLmZeUDvFKsPNN-2BDa3Xnbo5it7vnCST6RnR9EkF7DNz7XFQ5HNPfIKCo5-2BOTz5wzZeXfiL7wmNHTAtYA0zaWR3CCcKyLg0PQvsuEfSaTljCDnMSRe9qkjkkY5NyPinq1s2HWYF9ZrhJrYiGSbpp60OxxlKyEsVZF1Dam0BKnZyrTxV5IUG-2B9mXhPN0td5ONgHosUAw5SK2GYSCXRgz2sk43BI0xyTIBQIWkMu1IgkIYWieCunW-2Bs7y49nKMPupGZcdSNXg50bTuRn6uj42R8-2F6B6wVkFE4qi609AfXs0XV9XhLVA-3D-3D)
